name: HouseElspeth2
_source: s;Elspeth;Ailsa's house...{w} hah.{w} Untouched.|Even after all this, it's untouched.{w}{clear}Is that her old fishing rod? I still{br}remember when she let me use this.{w}{clear}{c:expression;Elspeth;HalfCloseEyes}It feels unreal...{w} a little pocket{br}of peace and memory in the storm.{w}{clear}{c:expression;Elspeth;CloseEyes}Almost feels like I'm not allowed{br}to be here, like it's...{w} violating.|Forgive me, Ailsa...{w} for everything.
s;SElspeth;Ailsa?{w} Is that you, dear? What's with{br}the formality?{w} That's not like you.
s;SAilsa;Eheh, sorry, guess I'm a bit nervous.{w}{clear}Been tough lately, watching the kid{br}n' all.{w} Guess I'm a bit wound up.
s;SElspeth;Mm, it must be difficult.{w} She seems{br}to like you, though! But I must ask,|rude though it may sound...{w} why are|you coming to me about all this?
s;SAilsa;Well, you see, that's...|d'you wanna go fishing, El?
s;SElspeth;...{w} From "Miss Elspeth" to "El" in{br}hardly a minute.{w} You're in a hurry!
s;SAilsa;S-sorry, sorry, I'm making a fool{br}of myself, aren't I?{w} I can just-

s;SElspeth;No, no, not at all!{w} That sounds{br}lovely! It always looks so peaceful.{w}{clear}Watching you out there on your{br}little boat, bobbing on the waves.{w}{clear}Must be nice, getting to get away{br}from it all out on the open sea.|A rare moment of solitude, no?
s;SAilsa;...{w} Y-yeah.{w} So, you'll come with?
s;SElspeth;Of course I will.{w} Shall we?
# Fade to black, then back in on the water
s;SElspeth;... So.{w} How's the, uh, fishing?
s;SElspeth;Is something the matter, Ailsa?|You seem...{w} out of it.
s;SAilsa;I-I'm just...{w} I've always{br}dreamed	of this, you know?{w}{clear}Being alone has its perks, but to{br}fish on the sea with company...

s;SAilsa;...{w} Don't got a lot of friends, El.{w}{clear}The guys're scared of me, and the{br}girls think I'm a huge bi-{w} er...|ahem.{w} They're not my biggest fans.{w}{clear}The kid's too scared of the water{br}to want to hop on the boat.|I've asked.{w} Multiple times.

s;SAilsa;It's...{w} so lonely out here.{w} Not just{br}on the sea, but...{w} in Eislinn.{w}{clear}I don't want to grow old in a place{br}like this.{w} I don't want to die here.|But living here feels even worse.{w}{clear}I-I just...{w} I get scared.{w} Of what{br}I might do if I'm left by myself.{w}{clear}Every time I head out here, and it's{br}just me and the call of the deep...|I worry it'll be the last time.|That I won't be strong enough.|Because I feel weaker every day.

s;SAilsa;But you!{w} You're so strong!{w} You're{br}always so nice to everyone in town,|and you look after us all without{br}a second thought, and I just...{w}{clear}I wish I were like you.{w} And I{br}thought...{w} maybe you'd understand.|Because nobody else does.
s;SElspeth;Because...{w} I felt you needed the{br}time to speak.{w} Was I incorrect?
s;SAilsa;No, I...{w} I don't think so.

s;SElspeth;Then it's my turn.{w} Ailsa, dear...|You're never alone.{w}{clear}I suspect you wish for more than{br}just the goddess's company, but...{w}{clear}she is with you, always.{w} And...{w} I{br}will be as well.{w} If you'd have me.

s;SElspeth;I am...{w} not blind to your struggle.{w}{clear}It is my duty to keep an eye on{br}my flock, after all, and so...{w}{clear}I was aware that you were fighting{br}an unseen foe.{w} It's in your eyes.|You look so tired.{w} It...{w} hurts.{w}{clear}And that you've kept fighting for{br}so long...{w} it inspires me.

s;Elspeth;Here{semicolon}{w} from now on, if you ever fear{br}what you might do out on the waves,|I want you to come find me, alright?|I will join you, no matter the day.{w}{clear}I will not let you fight this{br}battle alone any longer than I have.
s;SAilsa;...{w} Oh, El...{w} Th-thank you.{w} I-I...|Oh, g-goddess...
s;SElspeth;Shhh, it's alright.{w} You're safe.|I'm right here with you, okay?{w}{clear}As long as you're with me,{br}you'll always be safe.|I promise.{w} I promise...

s;Elspeth;...{w} O Goddess.{w} I've broken my{br}promise to her.{w} I've sinned.{w}{clear}{c:expression;Elspeth;HalfCloseEyes}I beg of you, grant me the tools{br}to mete out a sinner's justice.{w}{clear}Let me redeem myself in these final{br}moments by smiting our wicked foe.{w}{clear}{c:expression;Elspeth;OpenEyes}Let me...{w} let me keep her safe.|I just want to keep them all safe.

s;Elspeth;The rod?{w} I understand...{w} through this{br}rod, I can channel her lifelong fury.{w}{clear}That righteous anger lurking behind{br}her peaceful gaze...{w} is a weapon.{w}{clear}I will not let her suffering go to{br}waste.{w} They will witness her resolve,|and I shall call upon them to match it.{w}{clear}They will all be found wanting.
